name: Back To Square One (itch) (Vedang Rahurkar)
description:
"And sometimes you notice the world looks just like when you started, with the only difference being a stronger you"

-Ysra Daley-Ward

When stuck in a world where you can reset the world back to square one, new opportunities arise to solve different puzzles... Back From Square Square One is a puzzle-platformer where to get across each levels, players are forced to reset the levels and exploit the reset mechanic for their advantages.

Try solving the puzzles in each level to reach to the end with the ability to reset the world at your command...

How to play

  • 'WASD' or arrow keys to move and jump
  • Z to interact with objects in scene (pick up objects and call elevators)
  • X to drop picked up objects
  • R to reset the world

Tips

  • Object picked up do not reset and generates a new objects at reset position.    

Prototyped in 48 hours for BYOG 2021
